name: Dasherize
description: Dasherize is a beautiful material-based dashboard for your projects which provides you with an overview of open Pull Requests and Issues, and statuses of your CI, all on a single web page.

WWW_HOSTNAME.description: Your Heroku App url without scheme (**app-name.herokuapp.com**)

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: OAuth application's unique Client ID: https://developer.github.com/v3/oauth

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: OAuth application's unique Client Secret: https://developer.github.com/v3/oauth
